title: Studio Apartment For Rent In North Hollywood
posting_body: All utilities included except internet, in this well-kept classic mid-century low rise apartment building in NoHo's Valley Village area.
Unit is on the 2nd floor.
Building has 2 floors, no elevator.
Studio includes assigned parking space, refrigerator, new electric stove.
garbage disposal, new electric stove, new windows throughout, new window blinds, new waterproof laminate flooring throughout entire unit.
Bathroom has new bathroom sink, new mirror, new shower with beautiful shower tile and shower door, new mirror, new faucet ...
this unit is beautiful and updated.
New AC/heater wall unit.
Must see in person.
Property has an onsite building manager, laundry facilities, pool and assigned parking.
Conveniently located near NoHo Arts, trendy Studio City restaurants and studios.
Next door to Starbucks, close to NoHo West Shopping Center, Jon's and Ralph's Supermarkets, 7-11, LA Fitness, 24 Hour Fitness.
No smoking on premises and no animals.
Sorry no exceptions.
One (1) year lease only, sorry nothing less.
$1,600 monthly rent
$1,500 security deposit
$35 application fee.
Requirements: Have US Issued ID, Social Security Number, make 3 times the rent.
Be able to provide work & rental verification for the last 6 months.
Thank you for your interest.
